name: Jumpfinity
description:
A small game we had to do in our first class at university. We were 5 people from our class in our group and spent about 2-3 weeks of work on it. Everybody helped out with most parts of the game in the end so I can't take full credit for this, I just happened to be the one that uploaded it to itch.

How to play:

Use arrow keys to move, jump with arrow key up.
